Item.name: Bag of Pomegrenade Chips

Item.name: Bag of Mutated Pomegrenade Chips
Item.description: Dried mutated pomegrenade chips. A popular little snack. It is said to speed up the healing of burns a bit.

Item.description: Two slices of bread. Great for making sandwiches!
